participant_1.name: Rachel
participant_1.personality: She is adventurous and resilient, always seeking new challenges.
participant_1.background: i was raised in a single parent household. i only eat kosher. i am a stunt double as my second job. i read twenty books a year.

participant_2.name: Mike
participant_2.personality: He is thoughtful and introspective, often exploring the deeper meanings of life.
participant_2.background: i enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology. my parents taught me survival skills. i am also a graduate student. i walk dogs for a living. i'm an avid kayaker.

content.text: i am a little tired from work
